Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
public class Player
extends Observable
Class Player represents a player of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String nickname, Game game)
      Creates a new Player instance.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname
      game - the game the player has joined

  • Method Details

    • setActionDone

      public void setActionDone​(UserAction actionDone)
      Sets the actionDone attribute. It notifies the player's virtual view with a ChangesDone message if the action was a setup one, otherwise it notifies every player's VirtualView.
      Parameters:
      actionDone - the last action of the player

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname()
      Returns the player's nickname.
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Returns the game the player has joined.
      Returns:
      the game joined by the player

    • getBoard

      public GameBoard getBoard()
      Returns the board of the player.
      Returns:
      the board of the player

    • discardLeadCard

      public void discardLeadCard​(int index)
      Removes a leader card from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the leader card to discard

    • playLeadCard

      public void playLeadCard​(int index)
      Removes a leader card from the player's hand and adds it to the played leader cards.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the leader card to play

    • notifyNew

      public void notifyNew​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Notifies a player's virtual view with the played leader cards of this Player object. It also notifies the hand leader cards if the nickname provided is the one on this Player Object.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the notified player's nickname

    • isExclusiveActionDone

      public boolean isExclusiveActionDone()
      Returns the exclusiveActionDone attribute.
      Returns:
      true if the player has already performed a exclusive action, false otherwise

    • isTurnActive

      public boolean isTurnActive()

    • setExclusiveActionDone

      public void setExclusiveActionDone​(boolean exclusiveActionDone)
      Sets the exclusiveActionDone attribute.
      Parameters:
      exclusiveActionDone - the new exclusiveActionDone value

    • setTurnActive

      public void setTurnActive​(boolean turnActive, boolean gameSetup, java.lang.String oldPlayer)
      Sets the turnActive attribute for this Player object. It notifies all the virtual views with a TurnChange message if the game is not in the setup phase and the turnActive parameter is set to true.
      Parameters:
      turnActive - the new turnActive value
      gameSetup - true if the game is in setup phase, false otherwise
      oldPlayer - the nickname of the player that has ended his turn

    • setLorenzoActionDone

      public void setLorenzoActionDone​(UserAction action)
      It notifies the virtual view of the player with a ChangesDone message. Used in single player mode only.
      Parameters:
      action - the last action performed by Lorenzo De Medici

    • getHandLeaderCards

      public java.util.List<LeaderCard> getHandLeaderCards()
      Returns the hand leader cards of the player.
      Returns:
      the hand leader cards of the player

    • getPlayedLeaderCards

      public java.util.List<LeaderCard> getPlayedLeaderCards()
      Returns the played leader cards of the player.
      Returns:
      the played leader cards of the player

    • hasPlayedLeaderCard

      public boolean hasPlayedLeaderCard​(LeaderType type, Resource resource)
      Checks if the player has played a specified leader card.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the leader card
      resource - the resource associated with the leader card
      Returns:
      true if the player has played the specified card, false otherwise

    • setupDraw

      public void setupDraw()
      Adds four leader cards to the player's hand and notifies his virtual view with a NewHandCards message. Used in the setup phase.

    • setupDiscard

      public void setupDiscard​(int index1, int index2, int playerIndex)
      Removes two leader cards from the player's hand and notifies his virtual view with a NewHandCard message. Used in the setup phase.
      Parameters:
      index1 - the index of the first leader card to discard
      index2 - the index of the second leader card to discard
      playerIndex - the player's index

    • getActionDone

      public UserAction getActionDone()
      Returns the last action performed by the player.
      Returns:
      the last action performed by the player
